txt.en: 'You want to bring this letter to Lobelia, eh? Be my guest. It won't do a whit of good sitting here with me, you know.'

'I'm reading the letter. Leave me be! How is a hobbit to concentrate with annoying folk badgering them all day?\n\n'If it does not say anything about that cellar, I swear, I shall be positively furious!'
Bilbo's Letter
'Don't pester me! I'm reading. That Bilbo sure knows how to prattle on about nothing.'
'Shoo! If you don't leave me alone, I shall report you to the authorities!'
You have acquired Bilbo's parting letter
'If you're looking for that old weasel Lobelia, she's a few steps north of here. You can surely find her at Bag End, quarrelling about anything she can think of.'
'What's this about a spoon? He left me the silver spoons...he says they are the key to the cellar!'
Lobelia obviously wants to keep Bilbo's treasures all to herself

'What is that envelope you have there? Give it here at once! I am sure Bilbo meant for the successor of Bag End to have it, and not that fool old gardener. Indeed no; I don't believe he even knows how to read.'
Lobelia continues reading greedily (she is very unhelpful)
The Gaffer stands outside of his home on Bagshot Row.\n\nYou should ask the Gaffer if you can show Bilbo's letter to Lobelia.
Lobelia shoos you away and continues reading

Lobelia Sackville-Baggins is up at Bag End, north of the Party Tree upon the Hill.\n\nYou should bring Bilbo's parting letter to Lobelia, for it may give some insight into the locked cellar of Bag End.
Lobelia looks confused by the spoon reference
Lobelia Sackville-Baggins is up at Bag End, north of the Party Tree upon the Hill.\n\nYou should talk to Lobelia about Bilbo's letter.
Lobelia is taking too long to read the letter. You should prod her for information.
Lobelia is taking too long to read the letter. You should prod her for information.
Lobelia is taking too long to read the letter. You should prod her for information.
Ask the Gaffer for Bilbo's letter
Bring Bilbo's letter to Lobelia
Prod Lobelia for information
Prod Lobelia for information
Prod Lobelia for information
Prod Lobelia for information

Bilbo left a letter to the inhabitants of his beloved Shire in the hands of Hamfast Gamgee, affectionately known by neighbours as the Gaffer.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000> NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the event it is associated with ends. </rgb>

'Still here, are you? Well, I suppose if you are of an inquisitive nature like Mr. Bilbo himself, I'll let you in on something he said to me afore he disappeared forever.

'Old Bilbo, he said (with a sparkle in his eye) that his adventure would continue on even after he was long gone. That was Mr. Baggins, for you.

'Well, I'll not get in your way. Help yourself to look over his last letter for us, which my son Sam read to me. It has some particular instructions regarding that Sackville-Baggins....'
